Browse the source code of qv2ray/3rdparty/qt-qrcode/lib/libqrencode/rsecc.c

1/*
2 * qrencode - QR Code encoder
3 *
4 * Reed solomon error correction code encoder specialized for QR code.
5 * This code is based on Phil Karn's libfec and rewriten by Kentaro Fukuchi.

24
25#if HAVE_CONFIG_H
26# include "config.h"
27#endif
28#include <stdlib.h>
29#include <string.h>
30#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
31#include <pthread.h>
32#endif
33
34#include "rsecc.h"
35
36#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
37static pthread_mutex_t RSECC_mutex = PTHREAD_MUTEX_INITIALIZER;
38#endif
39
40static int initialized = 0;
41
42#define SYMBOL_SIZE (8)
43#define symbols ((1 << SYMBOL_SIZE) - 1)
44static const int proot = 0x11d; /* stands for x^8+x^4+x^3+x^2+1 (see pp.37 of JIS X0510:2004) */
45
46/* min/max codeword length of ECC, calculated from the specification. */
47#define min_length (2)
48#define max_length (30)
49#define max_generatorSize (max_length)
50
51static unsigned char alpha[symbols + 1];
52static unsigned char aindex[symbols + 1];
53static unsigned char generator[max_length - min_length + 1][max_generatorSize + 1];
54static unsigned char generatorInitialized[max_length - min_length + 1];
55
56static void RSECC_initLookupTable(void)
57{
58 int i, b;
59
60 alpha[symbols] = 0;
61 aindex[0] = symbols;
62
63 b = 1;
64 for(i = 0; i < symbols; i++) {
65 alpha[i] = b;
66 aindex[b] = i;
67 b <<= 1;
68 if(b & (symbols + 1)) {
69 b ^= proot;
70 }
71 b &= symbols;
72 }
73}
74
75void RSECC_init(void)
76{
77 RSECC_initLookupTable();
78 memset(generatorInitialized, 0, (max_length - min_length + 1));
79 initialized = 1;
80}
81
82static void generator_init(int length)
83{
84 int i, j;
85 int g[max_generatorSize + 1];
86
87 g[0] = 1;
88 for(i = 0; i < length; i++) {
89 g[i + 1] = 1;
90 /* Because g[0] never be zero, skipped some conditional checks. */
91 for(j = i; j > 0; j--) {
92 g[j] = g[j - 1] ^ alpha[(aindex[g[j]] + i) % symbols];
93 }
94 g[0] = alpha[(aindex[g[0]] + i) % symbols];
95 }
96
97 for(i = 0; i <= length; i++) {
98 generator[length - min_length][i] = aindex[g[i]];
99 }
100
101 generatorInitialized[length - min_length] = 1;
102}
103
104int RSECC_encode(int data_length, int ecc_length, const unsigned char *data, unsigned char *ecc)
105{
106 int i, j;
107 unsigned char feedback;
108 unsigned char *gen;
109
110#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
111 pthread_mutex_lock(&RSECC_mutex);
112#endif
113 if(!initialized) {
114 RSECC_init();
115 }
116#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
117 pthread_mutex_unlock(&RSECC_mutex);
118#endif
119
120 if(ecc_length > max_length) return -1;
121
122 memset(ecc, 0, ecc_length);
123#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
124 pthread_mutex_lock(&RSECC_mutex);
125#endif
126 if(!generatorInitialized[ecc_length - min_length]) generator_init(ecc_length);
127#ifdef HAVE_LIBPTHREAD
128 pthread_mutex_unlock(&RSECC_mutex);
129#endif
130 gen = generator[ecc_length - min_length];
131
132 for(i = 0; i < data_length; i++) {
133 feedback = aindex[data[i] ^ ecc[0]];
134 if(feedback != symbols) {
135 for(j = 1; j < ecc_length; j++) {
136 ecc[j] ^= alpha[(feedback + gen[ecc_length - j]) % symbols];
137 }
138 }
139 memmove(&ecc[0], &ecc[1], ecc_length - 1);
140 if(feedback != symbols) {
141 ecc[ecc_length - 1] = alpha[(feedback + gen[0]) % symbols];
142 } else {
143 ecc[ecc_length - 1] = 0;
144 }
145 }
146
147 return 0;
148}
